attributes.action: rule out embarrassing Britain by going to the IMF for a bailout.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of going cap in hand to the IMF for a loan, cut spending to match income like every person or business has to do.  

It is now obvious that the tax receipts of recent years were inflated by an unsustainable spending boom and we still borrowed more. Therefore with lower revenues inevitable for the foreseeable future we need to start living within our means and fast.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
